name: Kill The Monster Z
description:
Kill The Monster Z is a pixel-style, side-scrolling action game where you play The role of The main character, trying to destroy what you see as enemies, but it's not that easy. You're going to try and fail, and it's not an easy process, and it's going to take a lot of mental effort. Who are you, who are the hero and who are the monster, is a question that you will explore alone.

Game Tips



You need to know who you control.

You need special means to do that, like killing your own kind.

Maybe you could try the right mouse button.
